about_the_game:
STRATEGY MODE
WWBS is a strategy game where you can assume first-person control over any unit fighting on the field of battle. Apply the right strategy to different maps and directly support your troops on the frontlines!


FIRST-PERSON MODE
Support your army in direct combat on the frontlines. Play as any of the units and, for example, take control of heavy machine guns, trucks, planes, tanks, and many other weapons of war…


VIEW MODE
Support your army in direct combat on the frontlines. Play as any of the units and, for example, take control of heavy machine guns, trucks, planes, tanks, and many other weapons of war…


QUICK UNIT SWITCH
When playing in first person, you can quickly switch between particular units. This makes it possible for you to quickly help out your soldiers at various locations on the battlefield.


A VARIETY OF UNITS
Soldiers, medics, grenadiers, generals, HMGs, anti-aircraft guns, trucks, tanks, and planes are only some of the available forces. As you progress through the game, you get to unlock more units that bring more to the battle plan table.


EXTENSIVE MAPS
All maps have been designed so as to fully utilize the potential of each unit. Set up your guns on hills to make them inaccessible to enemy infantry, place obstacles, or guide the fight into natural barriers such as forests or crags.

It’s up to you who wins this conflict!
